title: Fix admin access authorization issue in production

requirements.text: Fix the admin authorization system so that the Principal ID '5xjc2-y22qo-6hyhb-cz5mg-dskju-ngytr-slbw7-lwush-4ucbp-glcln-s' is properly recognized as an admin and granted access to the admin panel in production

quotes: Access Denied - You do not have permission to access the admin panel

acceptanceCriteria: The user with Principal ID '5xjc2-y22qo-6hyhb-cz5mg-dskju-ngytr-slbw7-lwush-4ucbp-glcln-s' can successfully access the admin panel in production
The admin check returns true for this Principal ID
No 'Access Denied' message is shown to this user when accessing /admin

requirements.text: Ensure admin Principal IDs persist correctly across canister upgrades so that authorized admins do not lose access after deployment
acceptanceCriteria: Admin Principal IDs are stored in stable storage
After canister upgrade, previously authorized admins retain their access
The authorization state survives redeployment without requiring re-initialization

constraints: Must use the existing MixinAuthorization pattern already implemented in the backend
Cannot modify frontend authentication flow or Internet Identity integration
nonGoals: Changing the admin panel UI design
Adding new admin features beyond fixing access
Implementing a dynamic admin management interface
